title: Surviving the Corporate Zombie Apocalypse: Is your job sucking the life out of you!
description: This book is in dedication to all of those who have spent their lives in misery and never explored their true dreams. This book is dedicated to the reformed Corporate Zombies who refused to live by the rules and followed their hearts. But most of all, this book is dedicated to my kids, who I hope will have the strength and courage to live to their highest purpose. I love you guys all around the world! And to you Babes, thank you for never rolling your eyes at my crazy ideas, and my relentless search for … well, more! I love you!This book is dedicated to all the individuals who have followed their passion – the people who have escaped the Corporate Zombie Apocalypse. This is for the businesses that have worked on their culture so that they actively create a work environment that inspires, ignites and excites their teams. It is dedicated to the families who support the rehabilitation of Corporate Zombies. Here is to engaged members all around the world! UNITE!
author: Jacque Opie
